title: 340: Unhinged Date Night!
itunes:title: 340: Unhinged Date Night!
description:
Oh these are some uncensored memories, #broadsquad! During this wild episode (originally released May 2020) The Broads are joined by The Bros, Grayston and Evan, for a quarantine double date night to answer some fun and uncomfortable questions! Full of laugh attacks, interrupting, and tangents as they answer some Marry/F*ck/Kills, tell awkward hookup stories, chat Hogwart’s houses, answer “which of my friends are you most attracted to” #quarantinechallenge, talk about the “what if” relationships, and much more!

 

**Join The Broads Thursday January 6th for their first official new episode of 2022 - changes, answers, you won’t want to miss!

 

INSTAGRAM:

Chatty Broads: @chattybroads

Bekah: @bekah

Jess: @thebaddmom

Grayston: @pipyopi

Evan: @trippersounds

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***FLEX: Go to FLEXFITS.COM/CHATTY and use code CHATTY for 20% off Flex Disc Starter Kits - or 10% off your first Flex Cup - PLUS free US shipping! 

***PILL CLUB: go to THEPILLCLUB.COM/CHATTY - The Pill Club is offering a $10 donation to BEDSIDER.ORG for every Chatty Broads listener who becomes a patient!

***HELLO FRESH: Go to HELLOFRESH.COM/CHATTY16 and use code CHATTY16 for up to 16 free meals and 3 free gifts!

***JENNI KAYNE: Go to JENNIKAYNE.COM to get 15% off your first order when you use code CHATTY at checkout! 

***EVITE: Head over to EVITE.COM/CHATTY to choose from THOUSANDS of design options to create and send invitations for free!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
